body: [{ "role": "user", "content": "Hello, what can you tell me about Andrew?"},{ "role": "system", "content": "Hello! Thank you for your inquiry about Andrew Wichmann. Andrew is a highly skilled software engineer with 6 years of experience in the field. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Southern Illinois University in Carbondale. Currently located in New York City, Andrew is open to a hybrid work environment, combining remote and in-person work as needed. His target salary is $150,000. Is there anything specific you would like to know about his career accomplishments or any other details"},{ "role": "user", "content": "Do you know if Andrew is open to relocation?"}]
